title: Process Order and Generate Pick List
description: A sales order has been confirmed and needs to be processed and sent to the warehouse for fulfillment.

tasks.description: Retrieve a confirmed sales order that is ready for fulfillment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects a confirmed order from the queue.

tasks.description: Allocate the required inventory to the sales order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves the stock for this order, reducing the available-to-sell quantity.

tasks.description: Generate a pick list for the warehouse staff, optimized for the most efficient picking path.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list that tells warehouse workers which items to pick from which locations in an optimal sequence.
